message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for a limited time at the special price of $200. I think you'll agree it's a great deal for such a high-quality product!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but I'm not sure it's worth the full $200. Can you meet me in the middle?

Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the quality of this product is truly exceptional. How about we meet halfway at $160? It's a price that reflects its value while still being a good deal for you.
I understand that the product is high-quality, but I'm still not comfortable paying $160. I'm willing to go up to $130, but that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me at that price?
